RequestCredentials.summary: The credentials read-only property of the interface indicates whether the user agent should send or receive cookies from the other domain in the case of cross-origin requests.
RequestCredentials.value: A RequestCredentials dictionary value indicating whether the user agent should send or receive cookies from the other domain in the case of cross-origin requests. Possible values are:This is similar to XHR's withCredentials flag, but with three available values instead of two.
